mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (title, content, hit, users_user_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, 0, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT n.notice_id AS noticeId, n.title, u.nickname, n.hit, n.created_at AS createdAt FROM notice n JOIN users u ON n.users_user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY n.created_at DESC
